bike.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon w/ Integrated head tube w/1 1/2" lower, IST (Integrated Seat Tube), Oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XS (44cm), S (47cm), M (50cm), L (53cm), XL (55cm), XXL (58cm)
